comment:
Variables:
- x: number of low-powered air conditioners to be purchased
- y: number of high-powered air conditioners to be purchased

Constraints:
- Housing Units Constraint: 12x + 17y \geq 250
- Electricity Constraint: 150x + 250y \leq 3400
- Low-powered Limit Constraint: x \leq 0.3(x + y)
- High-powered Minimum Constraint: y \geq 7
- Non-negativity Constraint: x, y \geq 0

Objective:
- Minimize Z = x + y
